data.actual_result: It updates when you jump to the message depending upon the number of messages sent between the lastest message and the pinned message
data.expected_result: The new messages banner should not update unless someone sends a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Have some unread messages in a channel, not more than 50 to observe the bug. The channel should have some pinned messages  - Go to that channel and jump to a pinned message
